definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Beyond the bridge in the southeast of Fangwaiguan was a Western-style octagonal pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 方外觀西南橋外有一座西式八角亭。

sentences.english: Mr. Prasart hasn’t neglected the more modern, Western-facing Thailand in his collections.
sentences.chinese: P先生沒有忽略更能代表現代西式泰國的藏品。

sentences.english: Many Chinese audiences know the Western-style wedding from western films.
sentences.chinese: 相信許多中國的觀衆都從電影中看過西式婚禮。

sentences.english: Food gum's application in ham was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探討食用膠在西式火腿中的應用。

sentences.english: The dialog between blue bricks and Western-style eat desk and chair is thorough actually.
sentences.chinese: 青磚與西式餐桌椅之間的對話其實是深入的。

sentences.english: The western-style lamb chops are really succulent, invitingly giving off a sizzling sound.
sentences.chinese: 西式烤小羊排真很好喫，十分誘人地發出滋滋聲響。

sentences.english: Poached egg is usually seen in western breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 水波蛋是西式早餐的常客。

sentences.english: I like burgers most when it comes to Western fast food.
sentences.chinese: 就西式快餐而言，我最喜歡漢堡。

sentences.english: Our "creativity" sets the route of Western tray filling combining with Chinese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 這家的“創意”走的就是西式裝盤中式料理路線。

sentences.english: All the above rates are inclusive of 15% surcharge and one free daily buffet breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 以上房價已包括15%服務費及一份西式早餐。

sentences.english: I'd like to ask you a few questions about Western weddings. Is that all right?
sentences.chinese: 我想問幾個關於西式婚禮的問題。可以嗎？

sentences.english: Bread and milk is typical western breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 麪包和牛奶是典型的西式早餐。

sentences.english: Ming Yue coffee bar is to provide rich buffet and Western-style food for guests.
sentences.chinese: 茗悅咖啡吧爲客人提供豐饒的自助餐和西式美食。

sentences.english: Self-service ( Buffet) Chinese & Western dishes offer you a easeful enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 本餐廳擁有中西式自助餐，給您無拘無束的享受。

sentences.english: Dishes are buffet, Western-based, per capita consumption of 280 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 菜式是自助餐，西式爲主，人均消費280元左右。

definition: to pass an exam (or the imperial exam)/to qualify
harmonious combination of Chinese and Western elements (idiom)
